description: JobStatus represents the current state of a Job.

succeeded.description: The number of pods which reached phase Succeeded.

failed.description: The number of pods which reached phase Failed.

active.description: The number of actively running pods.

items.description: JobCondition describes current state of a job.

status.description: Status of the condition, one of True, False, Unknown.

reason.description: (brief) reason for the condition's last transition.

message.description: Human readable message indicating details about last transition.

type.description: Type of job condition, Complete or Failed.

conditions.description: The latest available observations of an object's current state. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/jobs-run-to-completion/
